# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a notification with the data from an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating Notifications

- **init(name:object:)**: Returns a new notification object with a specified name and object.
- **init(name:object:userInfo:)**: Initializes a notification with a specified name, object, and user information.
- **NSNotification.Name**: A structure that defines the name of a notification.

items.description: Returns a new notification object with a specified name and object.
